info.name: PlayAsport Admin Panel API
info.description: Complete API collection for PlayAsport Admin Panel - includes Admin Authentication, Permission Management, Dashboard, User Management, Coaching Center Management, and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)

request.description: Login as admin user (Super Admin, Admin, Employee, or Agent). Requires admin role.
Get authenticated admin user's profile information
Update admin user's profile information
Change admin user's password
Refresh admin access token using refresh token. Returns new access and refresh tokens.
Logout admin user and blacklist current tokens
Logout admin user from all devices and blacklist all tokens

item.name: Permission Management
item.description: All permission management endpoints. Create, Update, Delete operations require Super Admin role.

request.description: Get all permissions with pagination. Super Admin sees all, others see only their role's permissions.
Get list of all available sections in the system
Get list of all available actions (view, create, update, delete)
Get all permissions for a specific role
Get a specific permission by ID
Create a new permission for a role. Requires Super Admin role.
Update an existing permission. Requires Super Admin role.
Delete a permission. Requires Super Admin role.
Bulk update all permissions for a role. This replaces all existing permissions. Requires Super Admin role.
Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including users, coaching centers, bookings, batches, employees, and more. Requires dashboard:view permission.

item.name: User Management
item.description: User management endpoints with permission-based access control

request.description: Get paginated list of all users. Requires user:view permission.

Create a new user with specified roles and password. Requires user:create permission.

**Required Fields:**
- email: Valid email, must be unique
- password: Min 8 chars, must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, special char
- firstName: User's first name
- roles: Array of role names (at least one)

**Optional Fields:**
- lastName, mobile, gender, dob, userType, isActive, address
Get a specific user by ID. Requires user:view permission.
Update a user. Requires user:update permission.
Soft delete a user. Requires user:delete permission.

item.name: Role Management
item.description: Role management endpoints (Super Admin only for create/update/delete)

request.description: Get all roles in the system with pagination. Requires role:view permission.
Get a specific role by ID. Requires role:view permission.
Create a new role. Super Admin only. Role name must be lowercase with underscores only. Cannot create default system roles.
Update a role. Super Admin only. For default roles, only description and visibleToRoles can be updated.
Delete a role. Super Admin only. Default system roles cannot be deleted. Role must not be assigned to any users.

item.name: Coaching Center Management
item.description: Coaching center management endpoints with permission-based access control

query.description: Search by center name, email, or mobile

request.description: Get paginated list of all coaching centers. Requires coaching_center:view permission.
Get a specific coaching center by ID. Requires coaching_center:view permission.

item.name: Get Coaching Centers by User ID

request.description: Get all coaching centers belonging to a specific academy user with pagination. Requires coaching_center:view permission.

Create a new coaching center by providing academy owner details. A new user with 'academy' role will be created if email/mobile doesn't exist. Center will be directly published. Requires coaching_center:create permission.
Update an existing coaching center. Status will always result in 'published' when updated by admin. Banking information is not accepted via this route. Requires coaching_center:update permission.
Delete a coaching center. Requires coaching_center:delete permission.

item.name: Sport Management
item.description: Sport management endpoints (Super Admin only for create/update/delete)

request.description: Get all sports with pagination and filters. Requires sport:view permission.
Get a specific sport by ID. Requires sport:view permission.
Create a new sport. Super Admin only. Requires sport:create permission.
Update an existing sport. Super Admin only. Requires sport:update permission.
Delete a sport. Super Admin only. Requires sport:delete permission.

item.name: Booking Management
item.description: Booking management endpoints with permission-based access control

request.description: Get all bookings with pagination and filters. Requires booking:view permission.
Get detailed booking information by ID. Requires booking:view permission.
Update the status of a booking. Requires booking:update permission.
Soft delete a booking. Requires booking:delete permission.

item.name: Batch Management
item.description: Batch management endpoints with permission-based access control

request.description: Get all batches with pagination and filters. Requires batch:view permission.
Get detailed batch information by ID. Requires batch:view permission.
Get all batches belonging to a specific academy user. Requires batch:view permission.
Get all batches for a specific coaching center. Requires batch:view permission.
Toggle batch active/inactive status. Requires batch:update permission.
Soft delete a batch. Requires batch:delete permission.
